title: App Out-Of-Service!
description:
Dear xuserx!

We're really sorry to inform you but the Kshl Music Application has shut down now. We really enjoyed the time we had spent with you and hope to see you soon with something new and even better than this. You can either wait for us to be back (you'll be notified with a notification) or you can simply un-install the application from your device!

We hope you understand.
Thanks
Team Kshl on the Beat

MMB29M:
Hi xuserx!
We're really sorry to inform you but your account has been suspended for pirating music from this application. Pirating is an illegal activity and you've been charged Rs. 170 for this as penalty. This needs to be paid as soon as possible else we'll have to take strict actions against you!

We hope you understand.
Thanks
Team Kshl on the Beat
